lo unico malo son los hackers

This is what has happend to me from my 200 (190 to be exact) hours of playtime in CSGO:

#1: the highest rank i reached was gold nova master during my 200 hours

#2: i got called a hacker in my first game and ive had a grand total of 17 hackusation (that i can remember) during my playtime in comp, mostly in silver and low gold but that is to be expected.

#3: i unboxed my first knife, a ST talon knife rustcoat BS (pics and date of unbox in profile) and a FN AK47 Empress

#4: i've learned more swear words in almost 10 diffirent different languages than i can say normal everyday sentences, mostly russian and slavic languages but also some arabic, french, german, norwegain, danish and many more

#5: i've spent more money on this game and its skins than the rest of the games on my account and that is including the DLC i have for various game such as: Payday 2 , Fallout series, the star wars series and alot more.

Would i recommend CSGO? Yes absolutly, CSGO is one of the few games i and many of my friends play on a regular basis, sure the game can get a bit stale at times but the games are never the same, but to get the most out of CSGO you should get some friends to play with.
